CHAT.comment: PRISCILLA SUMMERS, ET AL. Petitioners v. EARTH ISLAND INSTITUTE, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:06 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MATT KENNA, ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER, ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:07 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
